ok guys & gals... currently i have some space problems with the hdd, BUT i'll try to seed everything again 
(the last weeks i only seeded week 4 to the end+1st ep)... have patience and i will seed EVERY TORRENT here for you.

...LINDA DEE:
i have 100kbyte/s upload so depending on how much u ppl help eachother out i can seed everything for u ppl in less than a week. sometimes i go on vacation and stop seeding too. some torrent clients CAN download a specified file first (one at a time), u may try uTorrent or Bittornado... perhaps ill seed other seasons of BB soon, but i dont have enough bandwidth atm... REMEMBER THIS IS SWEDISH/NORWEIGAN AND THERE ARE NO ENGLISH SUBS... (i consider making a translation though if enough of u ppl would want that for this old season of BB NOSE)

for everyones information:

im seeding ALL of the included torrents now...
most of the time im seeding 24/7 so if there are no seeders perhaps my computer is resting for an hour (or maximum a couple of days if im on a vacation)

btw... for those of u whore interrested in Anton's (bbnose's) week in bb-thailand u may also download this torrent: http://www.torrentreactor.to/torrents/view_113310/Big_Brother_Thailand_2006_Season_2_Day_63_Inside_Big_Brother_Anton_039_s_Special_Part_2_asf
im currently seeding but im not sure if the torrent is still considered alive

ok now people...
ive been seeding this season for almost 7 months now (counting an older deleted torrent too) and i would estimate that ive uploaded more than 1 terabyte of this "big brother season" during all of this time... since this is becoming really troublesome for my regular surfing and downloading/uploading (im on 10mbit DL/ 1mbit UL) i will stop seeding soon after new years eve... sorry to bring this sad news to begin year 2007 with, but since so few ppl have helped me out to seed this torrent during all these months it have really been torturing my internet experience for that long...
HOWEVER... i still want to share this with all u ppl so if u PM me here at TPB and whine enough about this season i will arrange something in the future, perhaps as little as a few months or maybe years (if it takes that long til i have a better broadband connection)...

conclusion... if u want to get this torrent in a convenient way start downloading this torrent with your highest priority now and seed while u download as much as u can (it will help me send/seed to u faster)... and make sure that ure done after new years eve since then i dont know how many days my patience will last...

Merry christmas to you all now and a happy new year! / LastNinja

...seems like this will never end as new peers connect all the time and want to download, and i would just feel too guilty aborting all of your downloads reffering to all the time u've put on this "slow" and "big" torrent...
guess ill go on seeding for a while longer, but dont expect 24/7 seeding as ive almost done since i uploaded the torrent... if i need to download/upload something else i'll pause this torrent for some hours or days...
anyway... i also have some other good news! :-) u can expect "BIG BROTHER 2005 NORWAY/SWEDEN" to be uploaded soon... im currently downloading it and when im done u will also find it here

yes... i will upload "big brother 2005 sweden/norway edition", but i want to give u the full experience so i will combine it with ~10 gigabytes of extra material... i think the torrent will become almost 40 gigs in total... this will be done when i have time to reassemble all the BB2005 material i have... i want to make one big, good and serious torrent of it... click on the nickname "ninjasource" to check if ive uploaded it... may take weeks or months til its done though

thanks for the great feedback! :-)

yeah, theres a constant demand for these BB 2006 torrents... so at times ive been forced to limit the UL speed to between 3 - 10 kbyte/s per torrent (for the 18 incl torrents it means a total of between 36 - 180 kbyte/s), to be able to surf the internet at the same time with not too much pain
...so im happy the effort is appreciated :-)

and of course i would upload more interesting torrents if there was more ppl like u, that kept these torrents alive by seeding... if i get a 10/100mbit fibre when i move to another appartment/flat i will upload more "rare" torrents and do constant seeding even at a slow rate like 30kbyte/s so its still usable (and fast if other ppl also seed)... when i upload BB2005 i will have to lower the speed a little bit for the BB2006 torrents (maybe maximum 100kbyte/s for all BB2006 torrents)

Its cool! ;) atm Im seeding the hole season in about 3 MB/s tho haven't got all of it yet.

Seeda please!

ok... i have some diskproblems but i will seed for a while... i will try to fix the problem by getting another disk or something...

the summermonths mean torture to harddrives - never put computers in direct sunlight.

btw, try to download as quickly as u can cause its time for vacation! :-)

i will probably not seed for 2-3 weeks now, but i promise i'll be back like ive always been after vacations :-)

im back seeding now :-)

in a soon to come future i will move to a new apartment... it will mean that i will lose the current internet connection... the consequence will be that i will not be able to seed this torrent for some time...
the good news though is that there is a good chance i will get the 100mbit/s connection so that the seeding speed will be raised by alot (instead of only 2mbit/s upload), and in that case i will upload BB2005 as soon as possible...

i will try to report when i will stop seeding, and preliminary when i will be able to continue :-)

this weekend the seeding will stop... i hope other people will help meanwhile...

i will be back seeding this torrent... it may take a couple of weeks or in the worst case months or even one year if the place where i move will only have a "integrated" ISP with supervision that dont allow torrents. in that case i will have to get 3G internet which is known to have problems with uptime and stuff like that.

sorry for the inconvenience. since ive seeded to thousands of people noone should have to worry. i think some1 can help meanwhile.

...i'll be back...

ni som vill ha dessa torrents nu ska vara medvetna om att internet förbindelsen ja har nu ligger bakom en brandvägg som inte ja kan göra mycket åt.

när ja seedar vilket antagligen kommer ske mest på helger o nätter (o kanske i snitt bara 48 timmar totalt per veckan) så har ja en upload på typ 100 mbit.

men det är alltså bara ni som har externt ip-nummer som kommer kunna ladda hem pga den där brandväggen ... 
ni måste alltså vara "connectable", (o om ni har brandvägg måste den vara rätt configurerad), eftersom det annars inte går att få nån förbindelse

ps. ja skaffade oxå 3's bästa 3g bredband och trodde att man skulle få dom utlovade uppladdnings megabiten men tydligen verkar dom ha nån sjuk begränsning av hastigheten med torrents - för hastigheten ligger som BÄST på 30 kbyte/s totalt i torrent uppladdning...

Any chance for the 2005 season soon mr. Ninja? Great job with this season!

ive promised the 2005 season for several years now, and i want to keep the promise. i have it ready togheter with a few dvd's of extra material (ripped from the bigbrother webcams)

the problem is that the computer with bb2005 is burried among with alot of other stuff in a storage room... the day i have a real appartment again i will keep the promise...

i have not forgotten about it, and i will put everything in one huge torrent when it will become possible... it can take months and it can take years... it depends on how quickly ill find a job, a new home and things like that...

hopefully things will come around soon but im not counting on it in the nearest months

im barely seeding the bb2006 torrents anymore, but i will become more active again in the future.
